title: Smoke over Rooftops
description: 61.36.12 ter, old frame, is located on P69B MS
provenance: Purchased from the artist by Galerie Kahnweiler, rue Vignon, Paris, France; sequestered by the French government during the First World War and subsequently sold at auction in Paris (13 June 1921, lot 63); purchased by Kahnweiler's agent, Grassat, for Kahnweiler's new gallery, Galerie Simon, 29 bis rue d'Astorg, Paris; sold by Galerie Simon to Alphonse Kann in June 1925; (sold Hôtel Drouot, Paris, 5 November 1942, lot 97, bt. Louise Leiris); Galerie Leiris from whom purchased by Curt Valentin for his Gallery Buchholz, New York, in 1949; purchased from Valentin by Putnam Dana McMillan on 17 July 1951; bequeathed by McMillan to the Minneapolis Institute of Arts in 1961.
